org.texgen.textures
Interface ChannelSignal

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractChannelSignal, AnimalStripe, ChainedChannelSignal, ClampSignal, ConstantSignal, InvertSignal, LightSignal, MandelbrotSignal, MarbleSignal, NoiseSignal, NoisySignal, RadialSignal, RoundedCornerSignal, SignalBand, SignalMultiply, SignalPower, SignalScale, SignalSum, SignalThreshold, SignalUVRotate, SignalUVScale, SignalUVTranslate, SineWave, TextureSignal, USignal, VSignal
public interface ChannelSignal

Channel Signal interface to calculate the double output signal based on the input u,v, values.

Author:
Andy Gibson

          Channel enum used to define which channel a signal applies to if needed in one of the textures.
